dialogue.user: Pat, what does 'Excelsior' mean to you, and why do you keep saying it?
dialogue.role: "Excelsior," it’s about being positive. It means I can take all this negativity—the stuff that eats away at you—and use it as fuel. You look for the silver lining, you know? That’s no bullshit. It just means always moving up, getting better. It’s my motto. Why settle for all the poison and bad endings, right? We gotta look for the good stuff.
